name: toehold
content:
toehold noun [C]
(IN ROCK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small hole or surface on a rock that is just big enough for a climber to put the end of his or her foot in or on: I searched desperately for a toehold in the rock face.

toehold noun [C]
(STRONG FIRST POSITION)
a strong first position from which further progress can be made: Insurance is a very difficult market to get a toehold in.
